meanings.sent1: The daubers in the art class enjoyed painting together.
meanings.sent2: The talented daubers showcased their artwork at the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The daubers at the party had colorful paint splatters all over them.
meanings.sent4: She was a dauber of emotions, expressing herself through her paintings.
meanings.sent5: The group of daubers created a beautiful mural on the wall.

meanings.sent1: The artist used various daubers to apply paint to the canvas.
meanings.sent2: The daubers in the kit helped create textured effects in the artwork.
meanings.sent3: The daubers in the toolbox were essential for the painting project.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers became daubers as she smeared the colors on the paper.
meanings.sent5: The daubers were carefully selected for their different brush shapes.

meanings.sent1: The colorful daubers added vibrancy to the painting.
meanings.sent2: The daubers of glitter gave the artwork a sparkling finish.
meanings.sent3: The daubers of frosting on the cake made it look like a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her hands were covered in daubers of clay after the pottery class.
meanings.sent5: The daubers of ink blended beautifully on the paper.
